blockTypes.description: Represents the initial input to the agent. It can contain text, data, or instructions that the agent will process.

properties.content: The actual input data or text

blockTypes.description: Represents an AI model that processes input and generates output. It can be various types of models like language models, classifiers, etc.

properties.modelDescription: A brief description of the model
properties.company: The company that created the model
properties.name: The name of the model

blockTypes.description: Represents the final or intermediate output from the agent. It contains the results of processing by the Model block.

properties.content: The generated output data or text
